About the job
Role overview
The Frontend Developer is responsible for implementing high‑quality web user interfaces that align with UX/UI designs and business requirements. The role involves working closely with designers, backend engineers, and product owners to deliver performant, maintainable, and cross‑browser compatible web applications. 

Key responsibilities
Develop responsive web interfaces using HTML5, CSS3 (Flexbox/Grid), and modern JavaScript (ES6+). 
Implement features using frameworks/libraries such as React, Angular, or Vue.js, following best practices and component‑based architecture. 
Convert Figma/Sketch/Adobe XD designs into pixel‑perfect, accessible UI with attention to UX and cross‑browser compatibility. 
Integrate frontend with REST/GraphQL APIs, handle state management, and manage client‑side routing. 
Optimize web pages for performance (bundle size, loading time, Core Web Vitals) and SEO‑friendly structure where relevant. 
Write clean, modular, well‑tested code; participate in code reviews and maintain technical documentation. 
Required skills and experience
experience in frontend or web development with a strong portfolio of production web apps. 
Strong proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript (ES6+), including responsive design and cross‑browser issues. 
Hands‑on experience with at least one major frontend framework (React/Angular/Vue) and common tooling (Webpack/Vite, NPM/Yarn, Babel). 
Familiarity with Git‑based workflows and Agile/Scrum development environments. 
Understanding of web accessibility (ARIA, semantic HTML) and basic UX principles is a strong plus. 
Nice to have
Experience with TypeScript, CSS preprocessors (Sass/Less), design systems, Storybook, or testing frameworks (Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress). 
Exposure to backend concepts (REST APIs, Node.js) or DevOps/CI‑CD for frontend deployments

Our Story

Established in 2006 in Singapore – and now a part of the $3 bn TechnoPro Group, Japan – Helius has partnered and supported leading companies across diverse industries including Banking and Finance services, Manufacturing, Logistics and Healthcare in the strategy, planning, deployment and management of business-critical infrastructure and software systems.

Our objective is to be a solutions partner for our customers by focusing on their needs, leveraging our strong resource team, being flexible in our approach, and using proven processes. Over the years we have established our clientele and a significant pool of resources and facilities. We continue to grow rapidly as a company with strong management, technical and financial resources and unwavering commitment to serve our clients.

Apart from its strong internal IT systems that deliver large scale staffing services programs and dedicated secure offices that house technology teams, Helius’ strength also lies in its understanding of cultural and language-specific landscapes in the ASEAN region.

Since our inception, Helius has expanded its operations from Singapore to Japan, India, Malaysia, Thailand and Vietnam.
